div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1021 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1947 Burial: mid 4th cent. B.C. (Karyszkowski) Contents: 17 AE. In one room in agora Olbia: 3 fish-shaped AE 2 aes grave (as Burachkov, pl. 1, 2 or 4, 8) 10 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 8 [1], 13 [5], 23 [4]) Unc.: 2 AE Disposition: Kiev Kharko, "Ol'viia," p. 368, nos. 991-5 (with omissions)
